name: Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
summary: It is about a London legal practitioner named Gabriel John Utterson who investigates strange occurrences between his old friend, Dr Henry Jekyll, and the evil Edward Hyde.
info:
• 中文名: 化身博士
  • 作者: Robert Louis Stevenson
  • 别名: 杰基尔医生和海德先生
  • 出版社: Longmans, Green & Co.
  • 发售日: 1886-01-05
  • ISBN: 978-0-553-21277-8

staff.name: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森
